Scene:
The Suwa Shrine
(Suwa Myōjin hyakudoishi / 諏訪明神百度石)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: October 1969

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Hanabusadayū III (豊竹英大夫 (三))

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
